author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch:
Not complete yet, but communication with trusted servers now works with the
Secure Tranport based SSL implementation.
* buckets/securetransport_buckets.c
(pending_stream_eof): Comments.
(sectrans_init_context): Don't pass baton to stream create function, not used.
(sectrans_read_cb): Replace abort() with APR_ENOTIMPL.
(serf_sectrans_encrypt_read): Return the data on the pending encrypted queue
after SSLWrite appended data to it.
(decrypt_more_data): New function, use the Secure Transport API to decrypt
data coming from the network.
(serf_sectrans_decrypt_read,
serf_sectrans_decrypt_readline): Implement as: read from decrypt.pending,
decrypt more if needed, read from decrypt.pending again.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch: Merge changes 1758 and 1759 from trunk.

author: lgo
msg: Major code cleanup.
* test/serf_get.c:
(handle_response): Remove 2 unused variables.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up r1740 with some bugfixes and more tests.
* buckets/aggregate_buckets.c
(serf_aggregate_peek): Make this function never return APR_EAGAIN. Don't
return APR_EOF just because the first bucket is a finite bucket. Check for
more buckets or call the hold_open function.
* test/test_buckets.c
(test_aggregate_buckets): Add test scenario reproducing the APR_EAGAIN issue.
TODO: tests for stream-type aggregate buckets.

author: lgo
msg: On the multiple_ssl_impls branch: Merge change 1756 from trunk.
